website_summaries.verdict: A nourishing, pleasantly scented kid-friendly 3-in-1 formula.
pros: Coconut oil cleanser creates a bubble-filled bath time experience

customer_reviews.title: strong fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Any dermatologist will tell you that any kind of fragrance, synthetic or natural, is a major allergen. Also one may not have a reaction initially but can develop one after some time and that is what happened with my kid with this body wash. It would be perfect in a fragrance free formula so I gave it two stars because the pounds of fragrance in it is the issue. I will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: cloudshade

customer_reviews.title: Great value for bath essentials
customer_reviews.text: My kids go thru bath soap like crazy They have sensitive skin and I don’t want to have tons of chemicals in their baths As a one time buy a this is still a good value But with the subscribe and save it made this about 8 dollars per bottle The bottle is nearly twice the size of what I usually get for same price I do also love the fact it has pump to keep my kids from dumping the whole bottle in Definitely happy with this buy
customer_reviews.author: wendy huetson

customer_reviews.title: It's Everything Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. Flexible use, and easy on scalp to skin. Someone heard my plea and answered. I had such problems with my son's hygiene. Almost impossible to find soap, wash or bubble bath that didn't do something awful to him, likewise with hair products. I found it when shopping for bodywash for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: toreshi

customer_reviews.title: Did not come sealed
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come sealed, pretty sure products that could be contaminated should arrive sealed... wasn’t comfortable letting my child use this, then was not able to return because I printed the return label on time but did not ship in time. I don’t think I should have to return if product is not usable. Very dissatisfied and feel i wasted $20.
customer_reviews.author: ACat

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent, price, and bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: No issues with sensitivity to skin, but its not tear free. I won't knock anything off for that though as it didnt claim to be. Works great for making bubbles and the scent is nice but not overpowering. Our little guy loves bathtime and the bubbles seem to last a long time. Bought this over other bubble bath soaps because of price and the size of the bottle. Would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is perfect. Not too strong and not too light. I wanted it to have some fragrance because I bathe my toddler before bed and I wanted the aromatherapy to soothe her to sleep. I love it. The only con is how many pumps it takes to make the bath bubbly. It took 10 pumps to get our tub filled with bubbles. I’ve used other soaps where it takes 4. So that’s the only thing.
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Doesnt sting eyes. The smell is londa strong but its a nice smell.
customer_reviews.author: Panicdanic

customer_reviews.title: Highly reputable natural brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Everyone Soap products for years. They are high quality, smell great, and most importantly, they are certified by EWG, so you can rest assured they are not poisoning you. Many "natural" brands actually are not safe like they want you to believe (that's called greenwashing), but Everyone Soap is the real deal. I hope they stick around forever!
customer_reviews.author: Cat K

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE LABEL FOR ALLERGIES!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a shampoo for my kids. For two of them, it’s been amazing. But for my daughter with a tree but allergy, she’s been more rashy than usual and I couldn’t figure out why. I happened to stumble across the website FAQs for the Everyone soap and found out that the cleansers are derived from coconut. Being completely new to the tree nut allergy world, I had no clue just by the ingredients alone and there’s no label or description stating it contains coconut. Please label for common allergies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I have used quite a few shampoo and body washes for my kids. Was disappointed with many brands and was searching for a good one. Highly satisfied with this one as of now. I was skeptical when ordering. But it is worth the value. I love the scent. But it is little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: NaveenKumar Namachivayam

customer_reviews.title: Awful after smell
customer_reviews.text: I kept smelling a really bad almost wet dog smell in my car until one day my kid in the car seat and could smell his head and it smelt like wet dog. We had just washed his hair that morning. I went ahead and gave another bath that evening and before bed time it still smelt like wet dog. The only thing it is good for is for a play bubble bath. We will not use it for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Smells so bad. The kids won’t use it. I can’t use it. I’m a complete waste not want not and always finish everything, but we just can’t. Do you know the smell of public bathroom soaps? That is it. Except more natural smelling as opposed to synthetic. I guess I’ll donate the bottles since it’s been in the cabinet for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Clanz

customer_reviews.title: Great 3-in-1 Bath Solution for my Kid
customer_reviews.text: As a mom, I try to make my life as efficient, as possible, so a great 3-in-1 shampoo, body wash, and bubbles is on the top of the shopping list for my daughter. Loved this affordable option. I was a little bit hesitant since my kid doesn't always like the smell of lavendar but she ended up loving the scent this 3-in-1 has. We've been using it for a couple weeks now and it hasn't burned her skin or eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little ones!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a while now. My children loves the smell, and I love the CLEAN feeling we see using it. This is the third installment of this product and it never fails. I can't say enough about the REAL clean we get from this. We will be using this product for as long as my boys are young. And I, as Mom, love it as well. THANK YOU TO THE MAKER!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great for shampoo and body wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice shampoo and body wash but only so-so as bubble bath. It lathers well and seems to add moisture to my daughter's hair. It even helps detangle it a bit. The scent is really nice too. Lavender is my favorite. As far as bubble bath, it doesn't make all that many bubbles but at least it's all natural and doesn't contain all the junk that most bubble bath does.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Jade

customer_reviews.title: The best 3 n 1 shampoo! I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this soap. I have used so many different brands. To many of them were supposed to be ok for eyes and they weren’t or they would not clean my son. He always had a odor after bathing him in different soaps and shampoos. This one actually makes him smell fresh, and his eyes don’t hurt! Most of all it’s 3 in 1 so u can use as bubble bath too!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi beach

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if you have kids. Smell is not overpowering but nice and you can wash your child's body and hair with it. Leaves them smelling nice and skin smooth and soft. Plus it doesn't have alot of the additives and such that other similiar products do.
customer_reviews.author: Brent B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: my boys absolutely love this soap. They love the scent of lavender. I love that this is all natural and easy on sensitive skin. It smells great, and of course with the natural lavender scent it helps my boys fall asleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids and it came unsealed and leaking all over the box. Strong lavender scent. The first time I used it on my 2 year granddaughter she screamed that it was burning her eyes. Total waste of money since I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hadaway

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent & Lots of Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this 3-in-1 Kids Soap is Amazing. It produces lots of bubbles and it has a calming smell. I have noticed that the kids hair is dry but a little conditioner every now and again fixes that concern. It's great for sensitive skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite full body wash for years now!
customer_reviews.text: We use this head to toe and have for about 5 years now. We are customers for life. I love that it's naturally made, naturally scented, and gentle. We use it for the infants in our home all the way up to us parents! <3
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Gammo

customer_reviews.title: No good for Hair.
customer_reviews.text: The minimalist in me wanted this to work for hair and skin, but it unfortunately dries out my hair, resulting in damaged, brittle, coarse hair. It seems ok on my skin, but I also put lotion on after a shower so it may be hard to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but bothered both baby and my skin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is almost 2 complained several times that her butt hurt after bath. Took a few times to realize it was the new soap. I discontinued use on her and decided to use it myself. I had the same experience, caused itching and pain in sensitive areas.
customer_reviews.author: LF87

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Everyone soap! It lasts forever and my sensitive skinned children do not have any reactions to it! The scents are incredible without being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Belanger

customer_reviews.title: good little soap for kids
customer_reviews.text: nice price for the size! I like how they are only lightly fragranced, and they are good for sensitive skin. Only downside is they don't lather up really well. All in all good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s face turned splotchy red right after using this! She has sensitive skin and this just didn’t work for her. It washes great, suds well, and left hair feeling clean and soft but unfortunately we can’t continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: ycm

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft scent
customer_reviews.text: We love the EO brand. I have very bad asthma and cannot handle any perfumes but these are more natural. I can only do the lavendar in the bath for my girl and I use the spearmint hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Str8kuntry

customer_reviews.title: Worst of all their kids shampoos
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the scent or the lather on this one at all
customer_reviews.author: dzad

customer_reviews.title: I love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I chose the two pack because we go thru body wash like crazy. Just 2 pumps and it makes a lot of foam which I like, so we dont use as much. I can also use it on my daughters hair and it wont make her hair dry like other shampoos she has gotten.
customer_reviews.author: linlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the money for the amount of soap that came. They were a lot larger than I expected, but it is perfect. I am trying to stock up for when my baby comes and this was the perfect amount for at least the first month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Kid's Soap
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this soap. It is easy for them to use themselves due to the pump and the size of the bottle (ages 5 and 7). It smells good and there are no complaints after using this soap for most of their lives.
customer_reviews.author: JoeySperz

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for kids
customer_reviews.text: We tried this soap and I love it! The smell is so soothing! It makes great suds for the kids. It’s easy enough to push down the pump for my 5 year old. My 2 year old who has eczema has not had any trouble with this soap. Glad we gave it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R. Fiamengo

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but harsh on hair
customer_reviews.text: The soap smells good but it’s a bit drying if you use it on hair. My son asked why his hair feels so hard after he washed with it. On top of that, the packaging is very poor. Half bottle was gone upon delivery , it leaked all over the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamoroll

customer_reviews.title: Good but consider somethings before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: It is as described. Size and ounces are accurate, actually a little bigger than expected. I subtracted a star because though it does make bubbles, it takes a few pumps to make them they you would expect. The bottles are large and worth the value, but it’s a lot of product for one scent. One bottle lastEd about three months with me using additional pumps for bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanne Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing scent and tear free!
customer_reviews.text: We had been using Burts Bees for the last 7 years but as the kids are older now I figured we could switch. We love the scent and that it’s still a kid shampoo and eye friendly. It also makes bubbles which the Burts Bees never did!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Palkovic

customer_reviews.title: Best kids soap shampoo and bubble bath
customer_reviews.text: I buy this regularly for my 6 year old granddaughter. Mild and makes a lot of bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: tngrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great scent. Great bubbles. Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than my usual go to dove body wash. Happy overall. No leakage in transit. Smells great and love that it’s for hair body in one.
customer_reviews.author: CC✨👩🏻‍🍳✨

customer_reviews.title: Great soap!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve switched from using expensive soap for my son to this with no problems with his sensitive skin. I love the smell, I even use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 7 years. Beautiful natural scent but it may bee not strong enough to shampoo 10 year old with bushy hair. Hope you’d launch pre-teen shampoo soon!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 1

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: My son has excema and this works great. He also very picky about smell. This works great for all three of my children age 6-12! Will keep buying !!
customer_reviews.author: Faith V Deragon

customer_reviews.title: smells amazing and kids like it
customer_reviews.text: If you love the smell of lavender, and honestly who doesn't, you will love this 3 in 1. I use it for my kids (age 6 and 4) as their body wash and shampoo. They also think it smells great. No problems, no irritation, nothing bad to say plus the value is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauran Sevier

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have three kids and we go through soap like crazy - this smells good but not too strong, and the pump action on the top keeps it from getting spilled or someone from squeezing out half the bottle when a parent isn't looking.
customer_reviews.author: CoburnVT

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice authentic scent. Decent bubble action and very good quantity. I pump about 5-6 times for a bubble bath. Like that you can also use this as a body wash and shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Not too strong smelling...kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time and smells subtle enough for even bubble baths. We use every day on my kids who have sensitive skin and it works well. No stingy eyes either.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Kindblade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skins
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for kids and adults. The scent is strong but in a good way. I love my kids smelling good and not having to worry about breaking out. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: My favorite soap for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite soap that I have used for my kids for about 10 years. Cleans and rinses very easily. Leaves a nice subtle scent.
customer_reviews.author: Peace and love mama ✌🏼

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. So far I've had them for months. I love it because it's EWG verified and doesn't have all those other harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Really great value
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying these bottles for a couple years. Very good quality soap/shampoo for a very good price. The kids love it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good texture, good value, smell is just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's got a good texture and lathers up well. I usually like lavender scent in soaps but this one smells kind of weird and off to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It's great that you can buy one product to do 3 things. only downfall, doesnt make many bubbles
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the money for the size! It does not burn my kids eyes when I watch their hair to which is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia cook

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this soap, the scent is nice, not too strong. It says you can use as a bubble bath but it doesnt create a lot of bubble. Otherwise it seems to be gentle on skin and eyes. We will keep buying it...
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: do not get in your eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is a fine soap. HOWEVER, I got in my eye by accident and it stung for an hour. I do not have any sensitivities. This is just some SERIOUSLY stingy soap. I am middle-aged and it was devastatingly painful. I would feel very bad for any kid that got this soap in his or her eye.
customer_reviews.author: cakelover

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Great price with 2 large bottles.everything is good moisture enough after use it but the smell is too strong.both of my kids do not like that smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jannie z

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and we love it
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo daughter gave this product 5 start. It smells great, mild and soothing lavender. Makes plenty of foam and washes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: My Sons Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son loves this soap and I love that I can use it as his bubble bath, body wash and shampoo all in one. The scent is great and he says he likes taking baths with it before bed cause the lavender relaxes him and makes him sleep better. Highly recommended if looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Products
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found EVERYONE, I am switching to all of their products. My whole family loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SOAP! We buy the kids soap in bulk and our whole family uses it! My husband loves the smell and its calming for bath time for our baby. I use it for shampoo and body wash. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bubbly fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son has pretty sensitive skin, so I love that I can use a scented soap without his skin reacting. I do have to be careful to not get it in his eyes. Excellent price especially for the size of the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It gets a 1 on ewg. Lasts a long time and has a light scent. I’m super sensitive to scents and this is just enough.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price for 2!
customer_reviews.text: Great price value compared to buying it in stores!! One of my favorite soaps to use on my child besides dr bronners
customer_reviews.author: j.s.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and gluten free
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s gluten free! It does it’s job but for some reason it reminds me of the smell of a wet dog when I was my kids with it haha
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Great product for eczema
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! My 6 year old and I both have eczema and this works great! I noticed improvements in her scaly, bumpy rash! Love it! The scent is amazing, it smells soo calming!
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Soft lavender smell. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: We are using it over and over. Soft smell, not irritating for the skin.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love it and the scent is pleasant and not too overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Becoming a fan and regular customer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. 3 units in my family uses this product I think its going be a family favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Had always stuck with honest Co and surprisingly like this SO much more !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product all natural but want in plastic free packing which can degrade into soil soon
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a RON of coups for my children because they have VERY SENSITIVE SKIN, this soap is GREAT, lathers great, Smells great, rinses off great! I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry & sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My son has dry and sensitive skin. Over time we have used many kids soaps, but nothing has worked as well as this product. I can see visible difference in his skin after using this soap. It doesnt dry his skin out like other harsh products. It also has a nice, mild fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav Sharma

customer_reviews.title: good smell, cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use pump for children, smells great and cleans really good
customer_reviews.author: Megan Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Smell!
customer_reviews.text: Will continue buying this to have as hand soap or in the guest bathroom. They smell great!
customer_reviews.author: Karla OH

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different clean brands of body wash and always come back to this one. I think I'm done trying and will keep using Everyone forever. It is very gentle with my skin without leaving it oily nor dry. It has good lather too!
customer_reviews.author: DianaV

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive kids, Burns eyes and skin.
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids did not like this... burned their skin and eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, gentle, great value
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good and this is a great price compared to retail price in local supermarkets
customer_reviews.author: Zandra33

customer_reviews.title: Safe bubbles for kids..
customer_reviews.text: It's a 5 star pick for my granddaughter.. She loves it...❤👀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, gentle on skin.
customer_reviews.text: We've been in the habit of picking up shampoo for our little guys at a local pharmacy, but decided to look for something a little more natural and easier on their skin. Everyone Kids Soap (we went with lavender) is awesome. It bubbles up great, smells amazing (but not overwhelming) and doesnt bother our little ones skin at all. Wish we would have found this a year ago!
customer_reviews.author: Chase DWT

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Lavender soap. Containers are marked Lavender, but, contained a strong Citrus scented soap that is very drying and not suitable for children. Worst soap ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is wonderful and not overbearing, and it makes me feel good that there are no harmful chemicals being applied to my child.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Mensink

customer_reviews.title: EWG certified safe, great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: EWG certified safe to use non toxic body wash for kids. Mild lavender scent, gentle cleansing and makes good amount of bubbles for bath fun. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: ... and soap I will ever use for my boys easy to use and does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shampoo and soap I will ever use for my boys easy to use and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kaylorboys

customer_reviews.title: Kids Shower soap
customer_reviews.text: This product for myself and my son did not do well. I wanted to try another type of soap and it caused a itchy reaction on my hands and arms, so I had to stop using it right away. Think its this lavender type scent... Update 2020 so I did buy this again and it has not caused any reaction of itchy. So for now its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great kid soap!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this soap! Have used it for a few years and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Mike brown

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Bubble Bath and body wash for kids
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value for the money especially since it’s a 3 in 1! My little boy loves it, will definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! My kids choose this over the aveeno brand. I don't blame them, This smells more like fresh lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha 22112

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's a 3 in 1 soap and it smells so good. I want to wash with it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: All over body wash/shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my grandbabies. It smells great and doesn't dry out their skin or cause issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kurash

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Quickly, Great for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is awesome since it is a bubble bath, soap, and shampoo too!! Now we don't have to have a million things in the shower for my kids. It works amazingly for us!
customer_reviews.author: Raina Mahanes

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap for my children. It smells good and is gentle on their sensitive skin. It Waldo bubbles up pretty nice so they enjoy that.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for our kids, but my husband who has psoriasis, still had a reaction. Otherwise very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soap for my baby
customer_reviews.text: A thousand times better than more expensive brands from California.
customer_reviews.author: Saree

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVe this stuff! It’s been hard to find through other retailers lately...Great price!
customer_reviews.author: WI Girl

customer_reviews.title: Stole the other bottle for myself!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent so much I put the other bottle in my shower for me! Smells like lavender and eucalyptus so it feels so airy and fresh. I can’t wait to try the other scents.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Beard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bubbles!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bubbles last forever. I love the scent on my little one and it has never irritated him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son looooves this shampoo and body wash combination. His skin is very sensitive and it does not irritate his skin which is so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle to the skin!!! I recommend this product my kids use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Gitty cohen

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is great but i find it not as good as the other brands in terms of the feel im getting from eat after using it on my kid :-(
customer_reviews.author: BUZI

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love. Kid live. Easy push spout. Delivered to my door!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan B. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Good for my boys eczema
customer_reviews.text: Good clean soap! My kids love it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: JSR8seef

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. Unfortunately it came poorly packaged with soap leaking. The lavender scent is a lot stronger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kmae78

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Game changer!!!! I'm allergic to commercial shampoo. My hair was dry and plain ugly. This product has returned moist and natural oils to my scalp and hair. I hope they never change their formula!!!!
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

product_meta.title: Everyone 3-in-1 Kids Soap: Shampoo, Body Wash, and Bubble Bath, Lavender Lullaby, 32 Ounce, 2 Count
product_meta.description: This versatile soap is formulated to be used as shampoo, body wash and bubble bath. The happy scent of Lavender essential oil will make bath time a refreshing, easy experience. From head to tippy toes, this wonderful soap will leave your kid clean and happy. Generously sized for every kid. 32 oz, packaged in a recycled bottle.
feature_bullets: Lavender and Orange essential oils are blended together to make bath time a calming experience.
Cleansers are derived from Coconut oil to create rich bubbles for an extra foamy lather.
Vitamins B5 and E are added to provide even more nourishing moisture to skin. EO Organic Herbal Blend of Aloe, Chamomile, Calendula, and White Tea extracts soothes skin and leaves it touchably soft.
Non GMO Verified, Gluten Free, Recyclable, Cruelty Free, No Synthetic Fragrance and B Certified.

specifications.Manufacturer: EO Products / Small World Trading Co.
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
